title: Blackberry Smoothie
directions: Place blackberries, banana, yogurt, ice cubes and ¼ cup milk in blender and blend until fruit is pureed and ingredients are well combined.
Add stevia to sweeten and more milk to get the desired thickness (if necessary).
ingredients: 1 - (6 oz) container of plain non-fat/low-fat Greek yogurt (I used Chobani)
½-3/4 cup unsweetened almond milk or other type of milk, if needed
a few drops of liquid stevia or other natural sweetener, to taste
